attributes.action: For baton twirling to be an Olympic sport
attributes.additional_details: This e-petition is is for the government to approach the Olympic committee and have Baton Twirling made into an Olympic sport as it is a very demanding sport which doesn't get the recognition it deserves.

rejection.details: This is purely a matter for the the International Olympic Committee to decide.   You could write to the British Olympic Association and ask them to approach the IOC?
